name: StringBuilder operations
prompt:
Add a public function called BuildGreeting to Calculator.calr that uses StringBuilder to efficiently build a greeting string. It takes str parameter name and returns str.

Use this exact Calor StringBuilder syntax:
§F{f003:BuildGreeting:pub}
  §I{str:name}
  §O{str}
  §B{sb} (sb-new)
  (sb-append sb "Hello, ")
  (sb-append sb name)
  (sb-append sb "!")
  §R (sb-to-string sb)
§/F{f003}

The StringBuilder operations:
- (sb-new) - creates a new StringBuilder
- (sb-append sb text) - appends text to the builder
- (sb-to-string sb) - converts builder to string
